title: Our Services
summary: We offer device repairs, electronics sales, software installation, and tech support.
steps: Visit the Services page on our website.
Select the service you are interested in.
Follow the instructions to request or book.

faqs.a: Yes, we repair laptops, phones, and accessories.
Yes, accessories are available in-store and online.

title: Return Policy
summary: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase in original condition.
steps: Select the order and click 'Request a Return'.

faqs.a: Return shipping is free for defective products.
Refunds are processed within 5 business days after inspection.

title: Shipping Information
summary: We ship locally and internationally with various delivery options.
steps: Choose your preferred shipping method at checkout.
You will receive a tracking number via email after dispatch.

faqs.a: Yes, we ship worldwide via selected carriers.

faqs.q: Can I change my delivery address?
faqs.a: Yes, contact support before your order is dispatched.
